name: api_playground
description: Universal API testing tool - Auto-discovers and tests all module APIs with zero configuration
author: P2P Data Products Team

features.autoDiscovery: Automatically finds all module APIs from module.json files
features.dynamicUI: Generates test interface for each discovered endpoint
features.zeroConfig: No manual configuration needed - reads from module.json
features.universalTesting: Works with current and future modules automatically
features.reusable: Drop into any project with modules/ structure
